pages.text: The Ectoplasms dropped by the Wraiths gave you an idea. With some $(l:intro/magical_components)Cursed Metal Ingots$(), you've managed to create an upgrade to your $(l:intro/dark_wand)Wand$() and create a Staff fit for a Necromancer.
The Necro Staff powers up Necroturgic spells, allowing one to summon more than 1 Undead Servant per cast for example.
